name: Lemon Coconut Chia Muffins
description: Lemon Coconut Chia Muffins. Zesty Muffins with Lemon, chia seeds, coconut and Turmeric. 1 bowl 30 minute muffins. Vegan Soy-free Nut-free Oil-free Recipe. Makes 10 to 12 muffins
recipeIngredient: 1 cup full fat coconut milk (If using other non dairy milk, add 1 to 2 tbsp oil or melted vegan butter)
1/2 to 2/3 cup sugar (raw, cane or other)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the wet ingredients until sugar is well combined. Refrigerate for at least an hour to hydrate the chia seeds. I usually keep it overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the wet ingredients until sugar is well combined. Refrigerate for at least an hour to hydrate the chia seeds. I usually keep it overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a muffin pan with muffin liners.Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a muffin pan with muffin liners.Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk all the dry ingredients. Add to the wet and mix to combine. The batter should be somewhat flowy but not runny. If too runny, add a few tbsp more flour and mix in. (If the wet mixture was refrigerated overnight, the batter will be thick and muffin like and not flowy).
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, whisk all the dry ingredients. Add to the wet and mix to combine. The batter should be somewhat flowy but not runny. If too runny, add a few tbsp more flour and mix in. (If the wet mixture was refrigerated overnight, the batter will be thick and muffin like and not flowy).

recipeInstructions.text: Add more turmeric if needed. Fold in dried fruit or nuts, candied lemon or blueberries at this point.
recipeInstructions.name: Add more turmeric if needed. Fold in dried fruit or nuts, candied lemon or blueberries at this point.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the batter into lined muffin pan. Sprinkle coconut and chia seeds on top. Bake at 350 degrees F / 170ºc for 26 to 28 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the batter into lined muffin pan. Sprinkle coconut and chia seeds on top. Bake at 350 degrees F / 170ºc for 26 to 28 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 5 minutes in the pan then a few minutes on the counter before serving. The muffins can be kept on the counter (covered) for upto 2 days, or refrigerated upto 5.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 5 minutes in the pan then a few minutes on the counter before serving. The muffins can be kept on the counter (covered) for upto 2 days, or refrigerated upto 5.
